title: I Can't Do The Hoodrat Wedding
itunes:title: I Can't Do The Hoodrat Wedding
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, this isn’t your typical letter, but just like everyone else, I need advice. I am a 37 year old female and I am professional wedding planner but I also have a corporate job that pays the bills. Six months ago, a co-worker asked me to help her put together her dream wedding. I was excited at first but then I realized that she had a very limited budget and very ghetto ideas. When it came time to choose her menu for the reception, she said that she had already picked out her food and set up the delivery.................

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Dear Steve and Shirley, this isn’t your typical letter, but just like everyone else, I need advice. I am a 37 year old female and I am professional wedding planner but I also have a corporate job that pays the bills. Six months ago, a co-worker asked me to help her put together her dream wedding. I was excited at first but then I realized that she had a very limited budget and very ghetto ideas. When it came time to choose her menu for the reception, she said that she had already picked out her food and set up the delivery.................
